answer:
For all individuals born after January 1, 1970, two doses of measles-containing vaccine are recommended. If you have documentation of 2 doses of measles-containing vaccine you are considered protected and no further doses of Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine are recommended.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## For all individuals born after January 1, 1970, two doses of measles-containing vaccine are recommended.

If you have documentation of 2 doses of measles-containing vaccine you are considered protected and no further doses of Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine are recommended.
Immunization Nurse
